greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Table read by antidiagonals of least integer "mod 4 prime signatures" k ordered by number of Pythagorean triples with hypotenuse = k.
comment: See A097751 for definition of "mod 4 prime signature".
Row 0 of table represents "mod 4 prime signature" values k such that no PTs have hypotenuse=k.
Row n of table, n>0, represents "mod 4 prime signature" values k such that n PTs have hypotenuse=k.
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pythagorean Triple.
results.author: _Ray Chandler_, Aug 26 2004
